item.title: Amazon Creating A Services Marketplace Online
item.description: A few thoughts: This is a very interesting way to take advantage of a number of existing Amazon technologies–primarily their payment processing and review system. Services are an increasingly important part of the economy and is less subject to commoditization. This is Amazon dipping into a massive growth area by commoditizing discovery and payment. It also offloads some of the risk from both sides of the transaction. It’s very bold, possibly brilliant.
